snippet.title: Gremlins Gizmo Video Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Visit http://gremlinsvideogame.com/ to learn all about the upcoming Gremlins Gizmo video game for Wii and Nintendo DS. 

Bring home your very own Gizmo, the irresistibly cute, furry and fully interactive digital pet Mogwai! Unleash Gizmo's fun-loving personality and musical abilities through nurturing interactions, exploration, games and discovery in Gremlins Gizmo.

Game produced by NECA - http://necaonline.com

Release is scheduled for 11/18/11.
